siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Sivo provides debt as a service. Our API allows companies to access debt funding and lend money to their users at scale. Sivo is backed by Y Combinator (W21).
blogPost.body: Sivo provides debt as a service. Our API allows companies to access debt funding and lend money to their users at scale. Sivo is backed by Y Combinator (W21).
blogPost.title: Sivo - Access debt funding and lend money to users at scale
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Sivo提供债务即服务。我们的API允许企业获得债务融资，并大规模地借钱给用户。Sivo得到了Y Combinator（W21）的支持。
localize.tagline: 获取债务资金，规模化借贷给用户

localize.description: Sivo提供債務即服務。我們的API允許企業獲得債務融資，並大規模地借錢給用戶。Sivo得到了Y Combinator（W21）的支持。
localize.tagline: 獲取債務資金，規模化借貸給用戶

previous.excerpt: Few have access to advanced tools & products in the current financial system. dYdX empowers traders with powerful, scalable, transparent, and fair financial products. We built the fastest decentralized exchange, built on Ethereum and powered by StarkWare.
previous.title: dYdX - Start trading on #DeFi with low fees and up to 25× leverage

localize.description: 在当前的金融体系中，很少有人能够获得先进的工具和产品。dYdX通过强大的、可扩展的、透明的、公平的金融产品为交易者赋能。我们建立了最快的去中心化交易所，建立在Ethereum上，并由StarkWare驱动。
localize.tagline: 在#DeFi上开始交易，费用低，杠杆率高达25倍。

localize.description: 在當前的金融體系中，很少有人能夠獲得先進的工具和產品。dYdX通過強大的、可擴展的、透明的、公平的金融產品爲交易者賦能。我們建立了最快的去中心化交易所，建立在Ethereum上，並由StarkWare驅動。
localize.tagline: 在#DeFi上開始交易，費用低，槓桿率高達25倍。

next.excerpt: Generate a 3D character that looks very similar to you with just three photos. Apply different ready-made animations to the model and record some fun, attractive videos with it in Augmented Reality.
next.title: Highavenue - Generate a 3D model that looks like you & apply AR effects

localize.description: 只需三张照片就能生成一个与你非常相似的3D角色。将不同的现成动画应用到模型上，并在增强现实中用它录制一些有趣、有吸引力的视频。
localize.tagline: 生成一个看起来像你的3D模型，并应用AR效果。

localize.description: 只需三張照片就能生成一個與你非常相似的3D角色。將不同的現成動畫應用到模型上，並在增強現實中用它錄製一些有趣、有吸引力的視頻。
localize.tagline: 生成一個看起來像你的3D模型，並應用AR效果。
